name: Shroom Lab (vasutp)
description:
You're a lab worker tasked to modify the mushroom specimen for your company.

Do your best! Deliver your shroom to the boss alive and well! Fight the mutation!

Click on the [INSTRUMENTS] button to influence the attributes of your shroom!
Keeping the balance of attributes while striving for highest possible quality of shroom!

Visual Design by Pattpasta

This entry is a prototype build in Discord Jam 5.
